entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 4:40 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
